21-011SC.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes of the Sustainable City Commission meeting of Thursday, February 25, 2021A motion was made by Commissioner Gonzales, seconded by Commissioner Rock, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 8 - Donna Bergeron-Birge, Keisha Gaines, Rey Gonzales, Jenny Novak, Eric Rock, Coby Skye, Morgan Wheeler and Sona CoffeeExcused: 2 - Carla Dillon and Alan TolkoffAbsent: 1 - Hilda Gaytan2.

21-010SC.summary: Recommendation to receive a presentation from the Long Beach Department of Energy Resources on Environmental Programs & Initiatives.Tony Foster, Manager of Business Operations, Long Beach Department of Energy Resources, spoke; and provide a PowerPoint presentation.Chair Coffee spoke.Commissioner Skye spoke. Tony Foster, Manager of Business Operations, Long Beach Department of Energy Resources, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Commissioner Skye and Tony Foster, Manager of Business Operations, Long Beach Department of Energy Resources.Chair Coffee spoke.Tony Foster, Manager of Business Operations, Long Beach Department of Energy Resources, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Chair Coffee and Tony Foster, Manager of Business Operations, Long Beach Department of Energy Resources.Page 2 of 5HELD VIA TELECONFERENCE, 4:00 PMTHURSDAY, MARCH 25, 2021CITY OF LONG BEACHSUSTAINABLE CITY COMMISSION MINUTESA motion was made by Commissioner Skye, seconded by Commissioner Rock, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 8 - Donna Bergeron-Birge, Keisha Gaines, Rey Gonzales, Jenny Novak, Eric Rock, Coby Skye, Morgan Wheeler and Sona CoffeeExcused: 2 - Carla Dillon and Alan TolkoffAbsent: 1 - Hilda Gaytan3.
